#!/bin/bash -ex
sudo su - 
yum update -y
yum install java-1.8.0 -y
yum remove java-1.7.0-openjdk -y
cd /opt 
wget https://archive.apache.org/dist/tomcat/tomcat-7/v7.0.56/bin/apache-tomcat-7.0.56.tar.gz 
sudo tar xvzf apache-tomcat-7.0.56.tar.gz -C /opt 
sudo chmod a+rx /opt/apache-tomcat-7.0.56/conf/* 
sudo echo 'export CATALINA_HOME=/opt/apache-tomcat-7.0.56' > /etc/profile.d/tomcat.sh 
source /etc/profile.d/tomcat.sh 
echo -e '<?xmlversion='1.0'encoding='utf-8'?><tomcat-user><role rolename="manager-gui"/><role rolename="manager-jmx"/><role rolename="manager-script"/><role rolename="manager-status"/><role rolename="manager"/><user username="tomcat" password="s3cret" roles="manager-gui,manager,manager-jmx,manager-script,manager-status"/></tomcat-user>' > apache-tomcat-7.0.56/conf/tomcat-users.xml 
sudo $CATALINA_HOME/bin/startup.sh 
sudo wget https://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-6.0-doc/appdev/sample/sample.war -P /opt/apache-tomcat-7.0.56/webapps 
sudo chmod 777 /opt/apache-tomcat-7.0.56/webapps/sample.war
